thread.section_title: Quasar Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quasar Expeditions | quasarex.com
thread.title: Mike Bianco
thread.title_full: Quasar Expeditions reviewed by Mike Bianco

author: Mike Bianco
title: Mike Bianco
text: The entire expedition was first class: the airport arrangements, the staff on board the Evolution ship, the meals, the snorkeling, the island tours, the educational briefings, and the high quality of the Naturalists. Overall the expedition exceeded our expectation and we'd highly recommend Quasar for coordinating your Galapagos adventure.
